channel.title: Why?
channel.description: Ok I can connect to my server from my localhost address 127.0.0.1 but why cant I connect from another ip surely my server is working if i can connect i have a no-ip etc

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @Incognito Incognito
item.description:

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

You cant connect with a no-ip from your same address, you can login with either 0.0.0.0 or the 127.0.0.1,

Read full topic

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

[quote=“scaper123, post:1, topic:265959”]Ok I can connect to my server from my localhost address 127.0.0.1 but why cant I connect from another ip
surely my server is working if i can connect i have a no-ip etc[/quote]

Well have you even tried hosting your server??? -.- Or opening any ports?.. -.-
…you can’t just simpily run your server and other people can play…

Read full topic

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

portforward.com

You need to portforward ot allow others to log onto your server.

Read full topic
